ModMetaData.name: DE Surgeries
ModMetaData.author: KapTaiN_KaVerN
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new surgeries to Rimworld.
- 2 cosmetic surgeries: Ear and Nose. - 9 chronic surgeries: Bad back, Frail, Cataract, Hearing loss, Dementia, Alzheimers, Asthma, Cirrhosis and Heart artery blockage. - 12 injury surgeries: Burn, Crush, Crack, Cut, Surgical cut, Scratch, Bite, Stab, Gunshot, Shredded, Bruise, Frostbite. - 2 Parasite surgeries : Muscle Parasite, Gut Worms - 12 bone/limb surgeries: Finger, Toe, Mandible, Pelvis, Clavicles, Sternum, Ribs, Radius, Humerus, Femur, Tibia and Spine.
Shamelessly updated through A14 to A18 without permission by KapTaiN_KaVerN, Originally by DarknessEyes
Icon used in preview image made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com and is licensed by CC 3.0 BY.
